label: Excel Actions
ConvertColumn.label: Convert Column Type in Excel
ConvertColumn.description: Converts the type of values in a specified column range between String and Number in an Excel file.
ConvertColumn.inputPath.label: Input Excel File Path
ConvertColumn.outputPath.label: Output Excel File Path
ConvertColumn.4.1.label: Text to Number
ConvertColumn.4.2.label: Number to Text
BlankRemoval.description: Deletes all blank cells (row removal) from the specified column in an Excel file and saves the cleaned file.
BlankRemoval.label: Remove Blank Cells from Excel
BlankRemoval.node_label: Remove blank cells from column {{column}} in Excel
BlankRemoval.return_label: Where you want the output file to be saved
DeleteByCondition.label: Delete Rows by Condition
DeleteByCondition.node_label: Delete rows from Excel where condition is met
DeleteByCondition.description: Deletes rows from an Excel file based on a specified condition in a given column
RemoveDuplicates.label: Remove Duplicates
RemoveDuplicates.node_label: Remove duplicate rows from Excel based on column {{column}}
RemoveDuplicates.description: Removes duplicate rows in an Excel file based on a specified column.
